alert.note: Alert for Knox; Lincoln (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 10 at 3:19AM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Knox and east central Lincoln Counties through 345 AM EDT... At 319 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Damariscotta, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Damariscotta, Bristol, Bremen, Warren, Thomaston, Rockport, Jefferson, Hope, Cushing, Edgecomb, Friendship, Nobleboro, Newcastle, Waldoboro, Saint George, Union, and South Bristol. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
